scripts.pg: set -e; for f in grammar/peggy/*.peggy; do if [ ! -s "$f" ]; then echo Skipping empty grammar: $f; continue; fi; base="$(basename "$f")"; out=grammar/out/$(basename "${f%.peggy}")-parser.js; if [ "$base" = "entities.peggy" ]; then echo Generating $out from common+entities; bun x peggy -o "$out" grammar/peggy/common.peggy "$f"; else echo Generating $out from $f; bun x peggy -o "$out" "$f"; fi; done
scripts.build: tsc && bun run gen:peggy && vite build
